original_text: If she please not her master, who hath betrothed her to himself, then shall he let her be redeemed: to sell her unto a strange nation he shall have no power, seeing he hath dealt deceitfully with her.
korean_text: 만일 상전이 그를 기뻐하지 아니하여 상관하지 아니하면 그를 속량하게 할 것이나 상전이 그 여자를 속인 것이 되었으니 외국인에게는 팔지 못할 것이요

sentences.original_text: If she please not her master,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 그녀가 그녀의 주인을 기쁘게 하지 않으면,

sentences.original_text: who hath betrothed her to himself,
then shall he let her be redeemed:
to sell her unto a strange nation
seeing he hath dealt deceitfully with her.
